item.title: Book: The AI Does Not Hate You by Tom Chivers
item.description: Attention Conservation Notice: I listened to this as an audiobook, which means my recollection will be worse as I have no notes. There is an excellent chance you are not the right audience for this book, refer to the bolded sentence below.

item.title: First Post
item.description:
"I wanted only to offer it to you plain and bare, unadorned by a prologue or the endless catalogue of sonnets, epigrams, and laudatory poems that are usually placed at the beginning of books. For I can tell you that although it cost me some effort to compose, none seemed greater than creating the preface you are now reading. I picked up my pen many times to write it, and many times I put it down again because I did not know what to write"

Miguel de Cervantes, tr. Edith Grossman, Don Quixote
